hero.title: Specialized recruitment and project management
hero.subtitle: Competent solutions for your business, a solid foundation for your career.

about.title: About
about.subtitle_one: Most Competence GmbH - Your bridge to international opportunities
about.description_one: Welcome to Most Competence GmbH, a company that has been successfully building intercultural and professional bridges in the German market for five years. We are a team of professionals coming from Poland who are passionate about connecting people and opportunities. Our mission is to create solutions that help companies in Germany develop their potential by leveraging the qualifications and skills of Polish employees
about.description_two: As a German company with Polish roots, Most Competence GmbH understands the unique challenges facing companies in Germany and the needs of employees from Poland. Our recruitment services are not limited to the mere process of finding suitable candidates. We provide comprehensive care, from recruiting, to advising on formal matters, to supporting accommodation. Thanks to us, German companies find qualified employees and Polish employees find a path to professional development in a new environment
about.description_three: Our experience in project management is the foundation on which we build our success and the success of our clients. We understand that not every company is willing or able to increase its permanent staff for a one-time project. That's why we offer flexible solutions in the form of temporary partnerships that fit perfectly into our partners' short-term needs and strategic plans. From the planning phase to final implementation, we are with you at every stage of the project
about.description_four: Our expertise extends beyond traditional recruitment and project management services. We also specialize in event coordination for the cleaning industry, working with renowned companies such as New Line and Biber Services. Our experience and skills in managing logistics and on-site operations make every event, regardless of its scale, a model of efficiency and professionalism
about.description_five: Working with us is a guarantee of commitment, professionalism and individual approach. The trust we have built over the years between our clients and our employees is our most valuable currency. Most Competence GmbH is not just an intermediary, it is a partner you can rely on
about.invitation_to_contact: We invite you to work with us - MostCompetence GmbH, because competence is the basis for lasting success.

errors.areaCode: The area code should have the format: '+X', where X is numbers.

company_contact_form.card_description: Dzięki temu formularzowi możesz zgłosić zapytanie, nawiązać współpracę lub zadawać pytania dotyczące naszych usług.
company_contact_form.name: Company name
company_contact_form.linkedIn_desc: Please provide the full URL of your LinkedIn profile, for example: linkedin.com/in/username
company_contact_form.instagram_desc: Please provide the full URL of your Instagram profile, for example: instagram.com/username
company_contact_form.another_sources_desc: If you have other important online sources, please provide their full URLs. For example: www.example-source.com
company_contact_form.send_data: Your information has been submitted. We will contact you shortly.
